db

Class DbController

  • java.lang.Object
    • db.DbController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDbController

    public class DbController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDbController
     class for the connection to the DataBase
 contains the userName, Password and SchemeName to the DB
 Singleton

      • createTable

        public boolean createTable(java.lang.String creatStatment)
        creates table in the DB only if not exists.
        it will take the crateStatement received and add prefix of:
        \"CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS \"
        Specified by:
        createTable in interface IDbController
        Parameters:
        creatStatment - the table to create
        Returns:
        true if query went through without errors
        false otherwise
